required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine Study in Adults and Children in India
clinical_study.official_title: A PHASE 4, OPEN-LABEL, SINGLE-ARM, MULTICENTER STUDY TO DESCRIBE THE SAFETY AND IMMUNOGENICITY OF 13-VALENT PNEUMOCOCCAL CONJUGATE VACCINE IN ADULTS 50 TO 65 YEARS OF AGE AND IN CHILDREN 6 TO 17 YEARS OF AGE IN INDIA

oversight_info.authority: India: Drugs Controller General of India

brief_summary.textblock: This study is to describe the safety and immunogenicity of 13vPnC in Indian adults 50 to 65 years of age and in Indian children 6 to 17 years of age.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Prevention

primary_outcome.measure: The proportion of subjects reporting adverse events (AEs) and serious adverse events (SAEs) within approximately 1 month after 13vPnC administration.
primary_outcome.description: Percentage of Participants With Adverse Events (AEs) or Serious Adverse Events (SAEs) within approximately 1 month after 13vPnC administration.

primary_outcome.measure: Functional antibody titers as measured by serotype-specific opsonophagocytic activity (OPA) assays before and approximately 1 month after 13vPnC administration.
primary_outcome.description: To describe the immune responses to the 13 pneumococcal serotypes induced by 13vPnC

clinical_study.condition: Prevention of Pneumonia and Invasive Disease Caused by the Serotypes in 13vPnC

intervention.description: 1 dose (0.5 mL/ pre-filed syringe) of 13vPnC administered at visit 1
10 mL of blood will be collected just before and approximately 1 month after vaccination.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Indian adults subjects between 50 and 65 years of age and indian children between 6 and 17years of age, determined by clinical judgment to be eligible for 13vPnC vaccination.
Exclusion Criteria:
Any contraindication to 13vPnC vaccination, vaccination with any pneumococcal vaccine within the last year

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

clinical_study.keyword: pneumococcal disease prevention; safety and immunogenicity study
